main.name: Danijela Divjak
main.description: During the day I am a full-time mom and at night a freelancer and a full-stack developer
main.bio: Hi there! I am Danijela! I've been coding for over 7 years now. As a Full Stack developer I've worked both with startups and large corporations to help build & scale their companies. Along the journey I realised my passion existed in helping others excel and pursue their dreams as upcoming developers. Among other things I love Traveling, learning about different cultures, reading books and long walking

education.description: My thesis was making animation in the LightWave 3d program. I graduated with the highest grade.
